rules_text:
When Daemthine's Diabolist enters, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, exile it. If you do, [b][create a 5/5 black Demon Horror creature token.]
[/b]Paradigm 4{R} [i](You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
